email_content:
Dear Mr. Thompson,

I hope you are well. I am writing to provide a concise update on our department’s current compliance status.

• We have reviewed the latest updates to international student regulations and confirmed that our department’s procedures remain fully aligned with the new requirements.
• All faculty members have been informed of the changes and given clear guidance to ensure ongoing adherence.
• We will continue to monitor any further policy developments and adjust our internal processes as needed.

Please let me know if you would like any additional information.

Thank you for your attention.

Best regards,
Your Name
Department
